answers.answer: i had the same thing happen to me. i was measuring 32 weeks when i was only 30 weeks and had an ultrasound at 31 weeks. she mustve just been sitting funny cuz she was right on target size-wise according to ultrasound. now at 38+1, shes measuring a little tiny bit bigger but not even a whole week and not enough to stress over. ive been suuuper worried about her size since i was almost 11 lbs when i was born and my little sister was five weeks early and was STILL almost 9lbs. my woman parts hurt just thinking about it...

Thanks for responding. I understand you being concerned. I have been measuring bigger since I was 28 weeks. My nerves are extremely bad. The biggest baby that I have had so far was 7lbs2oz. All I can do is be patient and wait until tomorrow.

question: I went to the doctor today and I measured 33+4 and I'm currently 31+5. My doctor is giving me an ultrasound tomorrow to check if the baby is really that big or is he just positioned in a way to make me measure further than what I am. Have any one else experienced this? I don't have diabetes so that's out of the question. All I want to know is what would cause him to be so big.
title: baby bigger than suppose to be
